website_summaries.verdict: Offers the same concept as the classic Rubik's Cube in a smaller version that's a good choice for collectors and fans of the puzzle toy.
pros: Carry this official miniature Rubik's Cube along with you anywhere you go
It's small enough to fit in your hand, bag, or pocket
cons: A few faulty cubes that fell apart have been noted
Some owners wish the turning mechanism moved faster and more smoothly

customer_reviews.title: Meh, I got the short end of the stick
customer_reviews.text: The product came in time and is as described but unfortunately I feel like I got the short end of the stick. When I opened the packaged I noticed that a lot of the faces seemed like it has been scratched. It has a lot of micro scratches on it, straight out of the package. Very upsetting. The worst part was that the orange had discoloration and black marks on it when I got it. It also does not feel as smooth as the 3x3 I’ve gotten in the past. If I didn’t get this product on sale, I would be very much disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Wilter T

customer_reviews.title: Easier but still hard
customer_reviews.text: This little rubix cube is a great travel size cube that fits easily in a purse to amuse children while out and about. It’s smaller so easier than the standard size but by no means easy. A fun game that’s oddly addicting and frustrating at the same time. YouTube will be your friend when your child believes it can’t be solved.
customer_reviews.author: Demilo

customer_reviews.title: Harder than you think, get a "knock-off"
customer_reviews.text: Speed cubes are better than these for actual use, the novelty of the rubik's brand being the original is cool for a desk piece but if you're serious about cubing then look to shengzou or another brand with less friction/binding.
customer_reviews.author: Teamkiller

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and simply to use for my 8 year old son... It is much easier for younger children to solve than the original 3x3x3 Rubik's.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny K

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing. Breaks easily. Difficult to turn.
customer_reviews.text: These cubes look fantastic! They are difficult to turn though. Also, I bought two and the plastic on the first one broke after a 2.5-foot drop. It could not be salvaged. I've dropped cubes that have come apart but I've always been able to get them back together... Except this one. It looks durable on the package, but it does not feel durable in hand. Unless you're just getting it just for looks, I recommend purchasing an off brand cube ($3-$8?) instead of this one. You'll get something easier to turn that will likely be more durable. I would not recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Becky G

customer_reviews.title: Came broken and not eligible for return or exchange!!
customer_reviews.text: Beware of this trash. Cube came broken and it is not eligible for return or exchange. Not sure if it’s even real, looks bootleg. Son was disappointed cause of this crap. Money down the drain 💩
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I fun pastime.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my 4th grade grandson and one for myself. I am enjoying mine. I think he would rather play a video game. But I like that it fits easily in a pocket or purse, I am old school and no I have not solved it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Penny L.

customer_reviews.title: What it says on the tin...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. I'm just starting out with these, and I really like this one. Reasonable price. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Iaah L

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, fun puzzle
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these for each of my kids for Christmas. The quality of the cube is very, very nice. I like that there are no stickers. It's a great puzzle for kids to play with, and it's easier than the classic Rubik's Cube. My eldest child is close to solving it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: freshnewday

customer_reviews.title: Good ole Rubix cube
customer_reviews.text: Easy to move and bright colors. I’m not sure why it asks if it’s great for beginners. Maybe because it’s two by two. It was still a challenge but very easy to turn.
customer_reviews.author: Gzuslivz

customer_reviews.title: get people doing fun things at a picnic with these!!!
customer_reviews.text: super for team games @ picnics...especially for all the people between the ages of 15 - 65....you know the ones that don't want to get up off their duppa (since their not use to doing that)...i had several different kinds of rubik's cube & made games out of the both for personal use & also for team activities...fun was had by everyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: amarok

customer_reviews.title: Can’t be better for this cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I love that they created an easier Rubik’s cube for people like me. Haha. Even though this was a prize for my daughters birthday party, all the tweens were excited to try and win it. Great value and great packaging for an add on product!
customer_reviews.author: Mike O.

customer_reviews.title: Rubik's smaller cube - back to the 80's for some fun with your kids
customer_reviews.text: Very cool and love how it has no stickers. We also have the 3x3x3 cube (original) and I can solve it (with some help). I have not figured this one out yet, it seems harder to me than the 3x3x3. But a fun toy and neat how toys like this are coming back so I can enjoy it with my children. Not to mention, it doesn't take batteries, doesn't have a screen and is great in the car or anywhere for some challenging fun.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and challenging! A great addition to your Rubik's collection!
customer_reviews.text: Love the 2x2 cube! I bought 4 so each of my kids can have their own. I thought the 2x2 would be simple but it is not! This is very challenging and I have to say I am very impressed with the quality. No more of the stickers for colors like when I was a kid. The color is embedded into the plastic so it will last! If you have not added the 2x2 cube to your Rubik's collection, you are missing out. This is a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: James Hester

customer_reviews.title: Good little cube
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this cube. She's been tinkering with a 3x3 and having school friends solve it for her. Now she's figuring this one out on her own.
customer_reviews.author: mareena

customer_reviews.title: Don’t judge it by it’s size
customer_reviews.text: This was a good cube, a little inflexible, but good over time. I would recommend this to people 8+ as it is a beginner cube that is easier than the original. Good Job!
customer_reviews.author: Sabz

customer_reviews.title: Received already opened
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and it was completely unpackaged. Obviously someone else has already opened it. Not impressed at this was supposed to be a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Cool little cube
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. And it doesn't have stickers for the colors, which is good for cubing.
customer_reviews.author: A_Lo601

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and amazing quality.
customer_reviews.text: This may be more challenging than a regular cube. But my son loves it. Kept him quiet for two hours in the car. I love that there are no stickers for cheaters to peel off. Colors are vibrant and integrated.
customer_reviews.author: Nakiah Burnes

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter cube
customer_reviews.text: This cube can use the same algorithms as the 3x3. However, you only use a subset of the algorithms; so this is a great cube to start kids on.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know they made these in other shapes and sizes. Love this. Got it for my 5yo son as a stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: kkTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Still hard lol
customer_reviews.text: Harder than it looks. I still cannot solve it. I’m a grown up lol.
customer_reviews.author: DejaLiyah

customer_reviews.title: It is a really good product
customer_reviews.text: I did like this product a lot, but it does not really keep you interested for the time you would want to be, but beside that it is a very good brain teaser product!!!😁🤩☺️
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Mason

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh... it was fun while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first day. My son dropped it once on the floor and it literally shattered into pieces. He got a total of 10 minutes of play, at most.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, giftable
customer_reviews.text: Smooth movement, colored plastic surface instead of stickers. Kids enjoy it but haven't solved it yet. Good gift, or in my case grandma's toy stash. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Raccoon

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift for my 4 year old,  prefect for his hands and not impossible to figure out.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this smaller one for my 4 year old son because I know he'll want my 8 year old daughters original rubies cube. It's the prefect size for his small hands and he enjoys twisting and turning.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy D

customer_reviews.title: Challenging for young and old!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for 8 yr old grandson. Parents limit his screen time and this really helped keep him busy while visiting us. A great challenge for young and old! Great for quiet time
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger kids who are new to Rubik's puzzle.
customer_reviews.text: My 8-year old wanted a Rubik's Cube, but I was concerned it might prove too difficult. Then I found this one! It being smaller gives him a great introduction to the puzzle, and once he's mastered this one, we'll get the traditional size.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Easy and basic
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the rubics cubes. And this one is just an easy fun one to mess around with for his collection. I'd recommend this for beginners, and people who like to collect them all.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I will beat the 2*2!
customer_reviews.text: I've come so so close to solving this! I have no chance of even completing a side on a "real" rubic's cube, but I was able to almost get this done. I should have googled for an algorithm instead of trying to fix it myself (and mess it up in the process). In any event, even my 6 year old can get one side done, so you get some sense of accomplishment.
customer_reviews.author: JandRMom

customer_reviews.title: Tricky little sucker!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my seven year old in hopes it would be easier than the 4X4. Wrong! While I’m sure it is easier it is just as challenging for a beginner. A good place to start for a newbie.
customer_reviews.author: RNC

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter cube
customer_reviews.text: My son has the 3 x 3 which is obviously much harder than the 2 x 2. This is a good starter cube for younger users, and even for others who like figuring out Rubik's cube. Quality of the product seems good and similar to other Rubik's cubes. Seeing my son try to figure out the Rubik's cube is a nice change from him playing his hand held video game system all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Mindcrime

customer_reviews.title: it was for them to geek out with their dad and learn- obviously it's a little out of their age range- but they love playing with
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our sons, ages 2 and 4. Mainly, it was for them to geek out with their dad and learn- obviously it's a little out of their age range- but they love playing with them. And the more they play with them, the more they are learning how it works. So I'm assuming in a few years, they'll have mastered the 2x2 cube :)
customer_reviews.author: B. N. Becker

customer_reviews.title: amazing... until pop
customer_reviews.text: This WAS a great cube. I loved it the second I got it turned great. I played all the time. I beat it in 8 seconds. Until one day im showing my friends my skill when a piece pops off. I fix it. Two days later it pops again... I fix it. Two turns later it pops. Then every time I fix it one turn later it pops. It was an amazing cube until it popped. If it didn't pop this would be a five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Tosh

customer_reviews.title: Great starter cube
customer_reviews.text: Great cube for beginners wanting to learn cubes. After learning to work, my son continues to work for the fastest completion time and now enjoys learning the 3x3 also.
customer_reviews.author: Jab

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, but definitely difficult.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy for my 5 year old who loves puzzles. She is by no means gifted. Average 5 year old. This 2x2 is hard for me! I'm sure some day she will enjoy it, but for now it's just too difficult. Not the toy's fault of course. It's built well and glides nicely. We looked up a YouTube tutorial on how to solve it, and still couldn't do it. haha. Some day.

customer_reviews.title: I rubiks cube I can do, occasionally
customer_reviews.text: my 8 year old son loves this. He's figured it out twice and I had to take it away the other day at the dinner table. He brings it to school, to bed, yes my son is a bit of a geek, but I think he like it so much because the ability to solve it is attainable. Id recommend this for sure for anyone 6+
customer_reviews.author: SKAP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to solve but also gave a fun challenge
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners and younger sibling who want to be just like big brother 😁
customer_reviews.author: YaMomnDem

customer_reviews.title: Put down the phone
customer_reviews.text: This is good way to have kids put down the electronics. Bought as a Christmas gift for my nephew and decided to buy myself one. Awesome twist on the classic. The 2x2 is all corners with no centers. This is not a speed cube but it is just as fun. I would recommend to anyone and everyone who wants a good challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this Rubiks cube! Moves great, and is fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: 4fam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My students are interested in Rubik’s Cubes but they were getting overwhelmed so I bought some of these 2 x 2 cubes and they’re starting to get the hang of it, now.
customer_reviews.author: Firecracker

customer_reviews.title: Best for 5-6 year olds
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old can easily solve this cube. May be best suited for 5-6 year olds. Still fun though for my son. It just doesn’t challenge him enough.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMomMeg

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work like a cube should - I personally don't like the LARGE branding non removable sticker marring one block
customer_reviews.text: The only negative thing I have to say about it is the branding - a large non removable sticker is placed on our orange side. I'd much prefer it be with out the brand and the same color on all sides.... it seems to work smoothly but we've only had it a month or so and only used it about once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Something diffent then the 3x3 cube. Recommend to all beginners.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Still hard!
customer_reviews.text: Well... I thought the 2x2 would be a bit easier for my children, but my 7 1/2 year old still struggled with this. It is a good product, but the age recommendations may be bit off as it says 8 and up. The design is great. No stickers = No cheating!
customer_reviews.author: 3xmama

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Feels like it is going to break when you play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: My 7-year old daughter LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted to learn how to solve these and figured teaching my daughter was a good excuse! I found the link below to be a fantastic method to teach the three algorithms required to solve the 2x2... using the story approach is far easier for kids (and adults) to learn... [...]
customer_reviews.author: Felonius.D

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO MOVE THE CUBES AND
customer_reviews.text: VERY EASY TO MOVE. MAYBE EVEN I CAN SUCCEED IN SOLVING THIS! SHOULDN'T STRAIN THIS GRAMMA'S BRAIN TO MUCH.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy H.

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: Not as easy as it looks. Fun gift for someone that has everything. Stocking Stuffer.
customer_reviews.author: MomofTwo

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better one
customer_reviews.text: It looks good but it's actually difficult to execute the moves as it is not smooth. I suggest spending a few more dollars and getting something better. You will not enjoy solving this cube. I have a good one 3x3x3 and the difference is noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Giuliano

customer_reviews.title: Great starting point for learning the Rubik's algorithm
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived quickly and was in a nice package. This would make a great gift for anyone interested in getting started with Rubik's cubes. Check out YouTube video's and learn the tricks of this puzzle. A great traditional game for puzzle lovers of any age
customer_reviews.author: Peter Stranathan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Item broke within three minutes of opening the package. Extremely disappointed. We expected better.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved this birthday gift. He's great with puzzles at only 8; but this wasn't as much of a challenge as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.text: Really good Rubik cube it is very fun to play with and good for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Toystory214

customer_reviews.title: Cheap - Fell Apart Out of Package
customer_reviews.text: Looked like a cool toy for the kid (couldnt wait to try it myself actually) but the thing fell apart as soon as we opened the package, into 20 pieces... this is a cheap POS. Whats worse is they wouldnt refund or even replace it.
customer_reviews.author: iz

customer_reviews.title: Don't get this if you like fast cubes.
customer_reviews.text: Not that fast. Go for a MoYu if you want a faster cube. I ended up tossing mine because I'm not a lube type guy. And it kept falling apart. So I just said screw it and disassembled it and throwed the whole thing away.
customer_reviews.author: thejv022

customer_reviews.title: Blocks keep falling
customer_reviews.text: Update: It broke. I cannot even put the blocks back on. My child is disappointed. I was expecting a higher quality from Rubik's Cube. A couple of the blocks keeps falling. It's very frustrating to try to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Movement, No issues.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had any issues. I love the fact that it has no stickers and moves almost effortlessly. That's always a plus. I bought this as more of a novelty because I have other bigger cubes but I found myself giving in to this one's small charm. Nice gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: kevinfTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: For 4$ I wasn't expecting much, but its still smaller than I expected. I feel like I could have gotten something better at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smiles

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend this puzzle.
customer_reviews.text: Movement is absolutely terrible on this. It is impossible to get a good speed on. It is nearly impossible to take it apart. Tension adjustments and lubrication are a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: WhatItIs

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Original, sturdy and smooth to play. My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Sony B.

customer_reviews.title: A fun puzzle
customer_reviews.text: Be warned, this 2x2 cube is not as easy as it seems to solve.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Weathers

customer_reviews.title: Does not turn so well.
customer_reviews.text: It works, but I would not buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. My 4 and 6 year old boys love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lynskey

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Son loved this he is 4 yrs old and wanted one since his older brother has one. This is perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: travel size
customer_reviews.text: this helps when you only have a little time between to-do things
customer_reviews.author: Christina Leonhart

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for a 5 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a 5 year old to play. Great motor skill for the little one. My 8 year old can solve it, not for a 5 yr old. Still, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: mom_of_2

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My special needs son loves this cube! So glad the colors are not stickers and its plastic. Real cube!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The item was really small.
customer_reviews.author: raul villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as some cheaper models.
customer_reviews.text: We are not as impressed with this cube as the Shengshou cubes. Although this one lasted about two months, it fell apart one day and it was very hard to put it together again. It now catches a lot and does not allow for speed cubing anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Rita D.

customer_reviews.title: It solved it once then the second time it took time to solve again
customer_reviews.text: I solved it one time. And now I can do it. And it takes a little time to get it right.
customer_reviews.author: SZ1106

customer_reviews.title: After a few weeks of use one of the pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks of use one of the pieces fell off. It's difficult to reassemble but I was able to repair it for the time being but I'm not expecting it to last.
customer_reviews.author: AKnauff

customer_reviews.title: My 19 mo old thought this was pretty cool. She can't solve it but she loves ...
customer_reviews.text: My 19 mo old thought this was pretty cool. She can't solve it but she loves mixing it up. Used it for a road trip and it worked pretty well as a distraction for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have bought several different kinds from amazon and he has been very happy with all of them
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandson for Christmas . He loves rubik's cubes . I have bought several different kinds from amazon and he has been very happy with all of them .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be good quality.
customer_reviews.text: these are great- we bought a bunch to give away as gifts when our children are invited to a birthday party. Seem to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor R

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my busy 2 year old. I really like how the colors are not stickers, they cannot be peeled away like back in the day. Very cool
customer_reviews.author: Tats

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Not as easy as I expected and I can solve the 3x3.
customer_reviews.author: SereneChaos

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but not fluid movements. Recomended for beginners and for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Pane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for starters
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves it. It's been 6 months and she still cannot get enough of it and carries it with her everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: kheerthi

customer_reviews.title: Adorably small and fun
customer_reviews.text: If you can solve a 3x3 then you can solve this with pretty much the same algorithms. People may find solving it over and over again boring, but I don't. It's good to use when you're bored and sitting around in say.. a waiting room. I love the fact that the colors aren't stickers so I won't have to deal with peeling.
customer_reviews.author: K_Renny

customer_reviews.title: Small but tough.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! I’m surprised how difficult it actually is though!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni P.

customer_reviews.title: It's a good toy!
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly as you would expect. Just a good ol Rubik's cube!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Forgot how FUN Rubix Cubes were!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fun fun fun!!! Bought it for my 10 year old son because he wanted to start off slowly into the Rubix cube world...but now I’m addicted!
customer_reviews.author: Illaroo

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in love with a 2 x 2 Rubiks cube
customer_reviews.author: Melylinn

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: It broke the first time my son played with it. One of the cubes came off in his hand. He wasn’t misusing it, he turned it once and it popped off.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: A great classic
customer_reviews.text: You can beat the original Rubik’s cube. This was a great product and the price was fair too.
customer_reviews.author: josiah salyer

customer_reviews.title: We can get it back to normal
customer_reviews.text: Its a 2x2 and three people can't solve it. Its harder, or we're dumber!
customer_reviews.author: TMSTCYR08

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this!
customer_reviews.text: Good clean fun for my kids. They love this! Moved on to master the 3x3 after first mastering this 2x2
customer_reviews.author: Runner Mom

customer_reviews.title: Rubik's Cube
customer_reviews.text: Grandson was so happy and he was very good with cube.
customer_reviews.author: brenda k soloe

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Brand
customer_reviews.text: Buy this cube if you want to complete your Rubick's collection. Otherwie go with another brand for speed. this is by far the best designed cube that Rubicks has sent out. It's quite sturdy, and very clean feeling. the stickers are molded into the plastic so no wear and tear (with normal use) the cube speeds up after about 100 solves. of course you can lube it yourself, might be a bit tricky to apply since the corners don't "pop" like its bigger bros do. All in all, buy it. hopefully rubiks will take this process into it's larger generations.
customer_reviews.author: Dhoward

customer_reviews.title: Just what our son wanted
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 year old son really wanted a rubies' cube for Christmas. We got him this one and he loves it. The pieces move easily
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this. Easier to solve but great for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Not as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I received the old design in different packaging. It's hard to turn and locks up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much and it came on time as well
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm no expert (I can't even solve this little 2x2), but I like the quality of this little guy. I like the feel of it. I wrangle it around and it hold ups great. It's actually my sons (4yrs old) who like me can't solve it but loves to play with it. I'll get it figured out. One day. Hopefully.
customer_reviews.author: oldOtter

customer_reviews.title: Cute and entertaining.
customer_reviews.text: This little cube is adorable and brain teasing! I love it. Using it to practice along with my other two: 3x3 and 4x4.
customer_reviews.author: KLA

customer_reviews.title: Might be cool
customer_reviews.text: This toy was a gift, and when it was opened one of tbe red squares was broken off. Hoping I can get it replaced!
customer_reviews.author: matthew sears

customer_reviews.title: ... he is still working on solving it but grows bored when he
customer_reviews.text: bought for my eight year old grandson he is still working on solving it but grows bored when he cannot
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Deceptively difficult.
customer_reviews.text: My clever boyfriend was surprisingly challenged by what would appear easier than say a 3X3 Rubik's cube. It is deceptively difficult, and he gave it the name "little bitch!" Which says it all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Good
customer_reviews.text: My son is 9 and loves the rubix cube. So I got this one as something different. It turns easily, good quality, and he was able to solve because he knows how to to do the 3 x 3. This one takes less steps to solve but you still need to know the formulas to solve the rubix cube. (You cannot just figure it out.)
